description: 用户修改自己的信息成功

requests.curl:
curl "http://smart-life.com/user_info" -d 'user_info[nickname]=%E4%B8%8A%E6%B5%B7%E6%B0%94%E8%B1%A1%E4%B8%8B%E5%B1%9E%E5%85%AC%E5%8F%B8&user_info[sex]=male&user_info[name]=%E5%BC%A0%E4%B8%89%E4%B8%B0&user_info[address]=%E4%B8%8A%E6%B5%B7%E6%9D%BE%E6%B1%9F%E5%8C%BAXX%E8%B7%AFXX%E5%8F%B7' -X PUT \
	-H "Accept: application/json" \
	-H "X-User-Token: qwertyuiop" \
	-H "X-User-Phone: 13813813811" \
	-H "Host: example.org" \
